alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:18PM PST until January 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY UNTIL 4 AM THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Rain, mixed with or falling as snow into this evening. Then, mix of rain, snow and freezing rain later this evening. Precipitation will be all rain after midnight. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, along with ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch, are possible. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Temperatures will hold in the lower 30s this evening, then slowly rise after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
